content.diagram_spec:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Customer
    participant Chatbot
    participant Knowledge Base
    participant Human Agent

    Customer->>Chatbot: Customer Input (e.g., Question, Issue)
    activate Chatbot
    Chatbot->>Knowledge Base: Search for Answer
    activate Knowledge Base
    Knowledge Base-->>Chatbot: Answer Found (or Not Found)
    deactivate Knowledge Base

    alt Answer Found
        Chatbot-->>Customer: Response
    else Answer Not Found
        Chatbot->>Human Agent: Escalate Case
        activate Human Agent
        Human Agent-->>Customer: Response
        deactivate Human Agent
    end
    deactivate Chatbot

mindmap
  root((Streamlining Operations with AI))
    Predictive Maintenance
      Reduce Downtime & Costs
    Fraud Detection
      Prevent Fraudulent Transactions
    Process Automation
      Improve Efficiency
      Free up Employees
